definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
(bird species of China) striated laughingthrush (Garrulax striatus)

sentences.english: Forms in which the stripes are obscure or lacking are called grass snakes.
sentences.chinese: 條紋不明顯或無條紋的種類通常稱草蛇。

sentences.english: Forms in which the stripes are obscure or lacking are called grass snakes.
sentences.chinese: 條紋不明顯或無條紋的種類通常稱草蛇。

sentences.english: Also, it would be best to stick with darker stripes, because contrasting colors add more depth.
sentences.chinese: 暗條紋也是個絕佳之選，因爲對比色會增加視覺深度。

sentences.english: The underparts were white with heavy dark streaks down the front.
sentences.chinese: 腹部從前到後有深黑色的條紋。

sentences.english: The Toucan has a large yellow and black beak and blue striped wings.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥款有一個黃色和黑色的嘴和藍色條紋的翅膀。

sentences.english: That day, he removed the male goats that were streaked and spotted.
sentences.chinese: 當天拉班就將有條紋有斑點的公山羊。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a pinstriped suit with a 34 waist.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一套腰圍34細條紋的西裝。

sentences.english: He was sitting there in striped pyjamas.
sentences.chinese: 他身著條紋睡衣褲坐在那兒。

sentences.english: So it was no wonder that Strippy was so high-strung, lacking freedom and exercise.
sentences.chinese: 失去自由又缺乏鍛鍊，難怪條紋每天都高度緊張。

sentences.english: Pattern was then transferred to a metal mold using Nickel-Cobalt electroforming.
sentences.chinese: 其次，以鎳鈷電鑄將週期條紋圖案轉移至金屬模仁。

sentences.english: For wedge experiment, using the concept of coherent length, we obtain the condition for emerging interference fringe obviously.
sentences.chinese: 從相干長度的角度，回答了劈尖干涉條紋出現的條件。

sentences.english: The tea-pot was brown with yellow bands.
sentences.chinese: 茶壺是褐色帶黃色條紋的。

sentences.english: For large primary coma aberration, interference fringe presents.
sentences.chinese: 大的初級彗差使焦平面出現干涉條紋。

sentences.english: Iron-deficiency anemia can lead to a pale color along with a thin, brittle, ridged texture.
sentences.chinese: 缺鐵性貧血會導致蒼白的顏色和薄，脆，縱橫條紋。

sentences.english: Having the aureate cushion for leaning on of candy strip, use make it of fabrics of silks and satins .
sentences.chinese: 有着條紋圖案的金色靠墊，是用綢緞面料做成的。

sentences.english: A novel phase unwrapping algorithm, based on intensity modulation analysis and adaptive threshold is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於條紋調製度分析的位相去包裹新算法。

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
